title: 插件配置文件乱码
author: zhi_Yuan_
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-4-16 14:02 编辑 

有没有大神告诉我咋解

#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  AutoMessage Configuration File
#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  Message Configuration:
#     Messages are handled in lists to allow for advanced customization!
#     Feel free to add color codes by using & in your messages!
#     To split a message onto multiple lines use the %n delimiter!
#     Lines starting with / will be run as a command!
#     To add single apostrophes into a message use ''.
#     For a complete tutorial go to http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/automessage.
#     If you are unfamiliar with YAML use the in-game commands: /am help

settings:
  enabled: true
  min-players: 0
  log-to-console: false
message-lists:
  default:
    enabled: true
    interval: 60
    expiry: -1
    random: false
    prefix: "&3&l鐩戠嫳鐙辫? >> "
    suffix: ''
    messages:
    - "&a杈撳叆&e/block &a灏卞彲浠ュ皢瓒冲?鐨勭熆鐗╁悎鎴愮熆鐗╁潡": []
    - "&b鐩?墠鍙?湁&c鐭跨墿鍧?&b鑳藉?鍗栭挶鍝?": []
    - "&a杈撳叆&d/sell all&a灏卞彲浠ュ嚭鍞?嚜韬?墍鏈夊彲浠ュ崠鐨勭熆鐗╂潵璧氶挶": []

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content:
？？？？？？
你乱码了
    suffix: ''
这行是什么意思

#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  automessage configuration file
#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  message configuration:
#     messages are handled in lists to allow for advanced customization!
#     feel free to add color codes by using & in your messages!
#     to split a message onto multiple lines use the %n delimiter!
#     lines starting with / will be run as a command!
#     to add single apostrophes into a message use ''.
#     for a complete tutorial go to http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/automessage.
#     if you are unfamiliar with yaml use the in-game commands: /am help

settings:
  enabled: true
  min-players: 0
  log-to-console: false
message-lists:
  default:
    enabled: true
    interval: 60
    expiry: -1
    random: false
    prefix: "&3&l鐩戠嫳鐙辫? >> "

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
zhi_Yuan_ 发表于 2020-3-30 16:22
我看不懂那繁体字是啥
这是乱码，和繁体无关。

就像這樣，这大概是自动公告插件吧，写你想写的内容，或者不写直接删掉。

replies.author: gecccc
replies.txt_content: 你这个应该是权限有关插件，那个prefix是姓名前缀，suffix是姓名后缀，下面的message是描述，推荐你去插件板块看看权限的配置文件你应该就知道是什么意思了。
编码错了 用软件改一下

replies.author: 粉碎英雄
replies.txt_content: 楼主加油
